|Title=Recognising the main abnormal movements on typical video cases
|Description=None
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=
|Order=4}}
Please refer to the CEN website where videos are available:

https://www.cen-neurologie.fr/videotheque

question.title: What is the main abnormal movement observed in typical video cases?

option_b.title: Dyskinesia
option_b.description: A type of movement disorder characterized by involuntary movements

option_c.title: Spasticity
option_c.description: A type of increased muscle tone

option_d.title: Ataxia-tremor syndrome
option_d.description: A rare neurological disorder characterized by ataxia and tremor

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The letter corresponding to the correct option
